about.title: Home Front Command Notificator
about.description: A bot to send Discord alerts for HFC (Pikud Ha'Oref) alerts

fields.name: Important Info!
fields.value: This bot is **unofficial** and is not related to Home Front Command. Please do not rely on this alone.

fields.name: What is this?
fields.value: This is a bot that connects to the HFC's servers and sends real-time notifications about alerts in Israel.

fields.name: Setup
fields.value:
Just invite the bot to a server (see Links below), and /register a channel to start receiving notifications.
Alternatively, you can /register a DM directly with the bot.
Please do note that the public instance of the bot is hosted on a private machine (A.K.A. an old computer I have lying around), so it may be a bit slow.
Feel free to host your own instance!

fields.name: Can I host it?
fields.value: Yes! Everything is available in the GitHub repository.\nMore info on the project's README page (See Links below).
